channel.title: Productivity on Pascal Precht
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Pascal Precht

item.title: A Productivity Manifesto
item.description: After reading quite a few books on productivity, lifestyle and mindfulness, and applying, integrating and practicing my learnings for quite a while in my daily life, I thought it would be useful to write down my thoughts on what works well for me in terms of getting things done throughout the day. There’s tons of productivity articles and resources out there and I’m sure some of my experiences overlap with what you’ve probably read somewhere else.
